Name: Behemoth
Ingredients: 20 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof /50% alc./vol.)
20 ml Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao
15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist and drops of walnut bitters on the foam.
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker.
Review: Tangy, citrus bourbon with a hint of chocolate.
History: This 'monstrous beast' was created in 2004 by yours truly and 'improved' in December 2021.
Nutrition: One serving of Behemoth contains 247 calories
